trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the \"Hidden Powers of Smiling\" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into over 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the \"Hidden Powers of Smiling\" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into over 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.

target.mrk: La TED talk de fundador y CEO de HealthTap, Ron Gutman, sobre \"Los Poderes Escondidos de Sonreír\" hizo alboroto en la conferencia del 2011, pero el verdadero éxito de la charla vino cuando fue publicada en línea. Hoy, la charla ha sido vista por millones, traducida a más de 50 idiomas por espectadores entusiastas de todo el mundo, y publicada como un TED book.

trans-unit.source: The first response to an inquiry on HealthTap came from a New Jersey pediatrician, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, who answered the question: \"Should I be concerned about my baby's previous vaccinations?\"

target.mrk: La primera respuesta a una pregunta en HealthTap vino de un pediatra de New Jersey, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, quien contestó la pregunta: \"¿Debería de preocuparme por las vacunas previas de mi bebé?\"

trans-unit.source: HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and over 330,000 global views. The event, themed \"Living by Numbers,\" focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor and Tim O'Reilly.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and over 330,000 global views. The event, themed \"Living by Numbers,\" focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor and Tim O'Reilly.

target.mrk: HealthTap patrocina orgullosamente a TEDx Silicon Valley, el evento TEDx más visto en el mundo, con audiencias para sus transmisiones en vivo en 50 países, y más de 330,000 vistas globales. El evento, con el tema de \"Viviendo por Números,\" se enfocó en cómo los números pueden impactar y mejorar nuestras vidas diarias, con oradores como Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor y Tim O'Reilly.

trans-unit.source: \"5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go\" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app that quickly changed the face of instant access to health information.

seg-source.mrk: \"5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go\" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app that quickly changed the face of instant access to health information.

target.mrk: \"5,000 doctores, a la punta de tus dedos – en tu casa o en el camino\" se convirtió en el lema del lanzamiento de la nueva Aplicación de HealthTap Express. Junto con la aplicación para médicos (HealthTap Express MD), la funcionalidad base de P&R de HealthTap fue capturada en una aplicación móvil novedosa y atractiva que rápidamente cambió la cara del acceso instantáneo a información de salud.

trans-unit.source: When a doctor feels an answer from another physician is right on target, they can \"agree\" with it – immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!

seg-source.mrk: When a doctor feels an answer from another physician is right on target, they can \"agree\" with it – immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!

target.mrk: Cuando un doctor siente que una respuesta de otro médico da en el blanco, puedes estar \"de acuerdo\" con ella – inmediatamente mejorando la credibilidad de la respuesta. ¡La respuesta con la mayor cantidad de de acuerdos sube hasta la cima para que los usuarios la encuentren!

trans-unit.source: Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our \"I <3 My Doc\" campaign – celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.

seg-source.mrk: Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our \"I <3 My Doc\" campaign – celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.

target.mrk: Nuestra Red de Expertos Médicos llegó a 10,000 doctores a principios del 2012 – ¡y todavía está creciendo! Esta meta coincidió con el Día de San Valentín, cuando lanzamos nuestra campaña de \"I <3 My Doc\" – celebrando a médicos en todas partes por su trabajo duro y dedicación a la atención de otros.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's award winning display at the first ever Developer Block Party (sponsored by the city of Palo Alto) featured in person doctors answering health questions of the thousands of people who stopped by our \"Doctor is In\" parklet.

trans-unit.source: Karl is the CEO and Founder of Coveroo. Previously, he was the CEO of Cloudmark, an entrepreneur-in-residence at Benchmark Capital, and founded and built companies including Dimension X (acquired by Microsoft) and Keen (Ingenio) (acquired by AT&T). He has been named one of BusinessWeek's \"top ten up-and-comers,” and was an early advisor to Facebook.

He has been named one of BusinessWeek's \"top ten up-and-comers,” and was an early advisor to Facebook.

Previo a eso, el fue el CEO de Cloudmark, un emprendedor en Benchmark Capital, y fundó y construyó compañías incluyendo Dimension X (adquirida por Microsoft) y Keen (Ingenio) (adquirida por AT&T). Ha sido nombrado uno de los \"10 con probabilidades de éxito\", y fue uno de los primeros asesores de Facebook.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I\'m most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It\'s this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the \'consumerization\' of Healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I\'m most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It\'s this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the \'consumerization\' of Healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.

target.mrk: HealthTap encarna la poderosa tendencia de consumidores en el Internet de mover experiencias mainstream valiosas offline, como interacciones médico-paciente, al mundo en línea. La compañía se aprovecha de tres motores de innovación clave de los cuales estoy más emocionado: aplicaciones móviles que permiten nuevas interacciones ricas y personalizadas vía teléfono inteligente y tabletas; ludificación que mejora las interacciones y retención de usuarios; y mecánicas sociales; como P&R de expertos y gráficos de reputación, que facilitan profundo interés y confianza. Esta clase de pensamiento innovador es el que acelerará la \'consumerización\' de la Atención a la Salud, y revigorizará una industria extremadamente importante y valiosa que se ha quedado atrás en lo que respecta a IT, y que ha estado inmersa en la ineficiencia por décadas.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap\'s approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap\'s approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.

target.mrk: El abordaje de HealthTap es brillante. Entrega lo que la gente más extraña sobre la medicina: una experiencia sumamente personalizada, con doctores confiables compartiendo información útil.

trans-unit.source: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there\'s nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.

seg-source.mrk: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there\'s nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.

target.mrk: Yo tiendo a [invertir en] cosas que son comercio en línea, como la atención a la salud. Las cosas que son más complejas de hacer, y resolver un problema real en un mercado grande donde nadie está haciendo lo que HealthTap está haciendo. Lo que HealthTap está haciendo es revolucionario.

trans-unit.source: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health. HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone\'s health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.

I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.

target.mrk: Pronto todos se convertirán en el CEO de su propia salud. HealthTap>, con su crecimiento fenomenal en combinación con su tecnología única, tiene el potencial de convertirse en la plataforma de triage para la salud de todos. Estoy emocionado por trabajar con el equipo HealthTap mientras la compañía se escala para brindar acceso inmediato y sin igual al conocimiento médico, doctores y servicios de salud más confiables.

trans-unit.source: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD\'s resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we\'re excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.

seg-source.mrk: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD\'s resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we\'re excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.

target.mrk: En su estado actual, nuestro sistema atención a la salud es caro, difícil de acceder, y propenso a errores. Al borde una masiva reforma a la atención a la salud, emprendedores y tecnólogos brillantes y dedicados pueden traer mucho a la mesa al desarrollar soluciones creativas y novedosas que se aprovechan de los profesionales de la atención a la salud. HealthTap está a la vanguardia de este desarrollo, mejorando la atención al paciente creando acceso accesible, fácil y rápido a doctores en todos lados. El futuro de la atención a la salud está en la convergencia de big data, algoritmos inteligentes e interfaz fáciles de usar que brindan amplificación de los recursos de nuestros MD: HealthTap es pionero en las tres, y estamos emocionados por ayudarlos a hacer su atractiva visión una realidad transformativa.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is important because it\'s a source for well-balanced, medically appropriate information on the web to counter some of the false claims and misinformation.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a platform for me to participate in patient education. Indeed, it\'s also a place where doctors can learn pearls from each other, and that\'s very valuable.

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap website is an exciting and promising new way for physician experts to share trusted information to parents in a way that is user-friendly. I\'m excited to see this new forum for exchanging medical information.

seg-source.mrk: The HealthTap website is an exciting and promising new way for physician experts to share trusted information to parents in a way that is user-friendly. I\'m excited to see this new forum for exchanging medical information.

trans-unit.source: Ask a simple question, get a simple answer, from someone you can depend on. That\'s the kind of education that parents can really use.

Si te gustaría añadir a tu institución a HealthTap, y obtener todos los beneficios de un sitio web optimizado y una robusta audiencia de pacientes de forma gratuita, por favor, contáctanos.

trans-unit.source: So where do medical students come in? I\'ll see a patient question pop up on the website, and I can submit a draft of the answer. A physician will then edit what I submitted and publish it on the site. It has been a fantastic learning experience for me, as I frequently have to do some research in order to answer the question. The physician editing process mirrors what actually happens in real life when I present a patient during morning rounds. In the hospital, some of the physicians in the hospital will tear my presentation apart, correcting me or questioning everything I say, while other docs just let me present and tell me I did a good job after.

seg-source.mrk: So where do medical students come in? I\'ll see a patient question pop up on the website, and I can submit a draft of the answer. A physician will then edit what I submitted and publish it on the site. It has been a fantastic learning experience for me, as I frequently have to do some research in order to answer the question. The physician editing process mirrors what actually happens in real life when I present a patient during morning rounds. In the hospital, some of the physicians in the hospital will tear my presentation apart, correcting me or questioning everything I say, while other docs just let me present and tell me I did a good job after.

target.mrk: ¿Entonces dónde entran los estudiantes de medicina? Veo una pregunta de un paciente en el sitio web, y puedo presentar un borrador de la respuesta. Un médico procederá a editar lo que presenté y a publicarlo en el sitio. Ha sido una fantástica experiencia de aprendizaje para mí, ya que frecuentemente tengo que hacer investigación para poder contestar la pregunta. El proceso de edición del médico es similar a lo que pasa en la vida real cuando presento a un paciente en el pase de visita matutino. En el hospital, algunos de los médicos en el hospital destrozan mi presentación, corrigiendo o cuestionando todo lo que digo, mientras que otros doctores solo me dejan presentar y después me dicen que hice un buen trabajo.

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap is an app that helps you] keep your New Year's resolutions

trans-unit.source: [With HealthTap] everyone gets smarter about health care, and how to navigate the medical industry...

trans-unit.source: HealthTap will metamorphose from a Q&A site into a service that doctors, hospitals, or provider organizations will buy to manage their larger patient pools more efficiently.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap helps you 'prepare...to ask smarter questions when [you] get to the doctor's office'.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap helps you 'prepare...to ask smarter questions when [you] get to the doctor's office'.

trans-unit.source: The web’s go-to repository for health info that’s actually reliable. ... over the past five months, 2,963 people have sent HealthTap thank-you notes saying that these doctor answers had saved their lives ... if someone were to ask you why healthtech is important, this is it.

seg-source.mrk: The web’s go-to repository for health info that’s actually reliable. ... over the past five months, 2,963 people have sent HealthTap thank-you notes saying that these doctor answers had saved their lives ... if someone were to ask you why healthtech is important, this is it.

target.mrk: El archivo a que acudir de la web para información de salud fiable. ... en los últimos cinco meses, 2,963 personas han enviado notas de agradecimiento a HealthTap diciendo que estas respuestas de doctores han salvado sus vidas... si alguien te preguntara por qué la atención a la salud es importante, está es la razón.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s Q&A service sees 7.5M uniques per month, with MDs spending an hour per session providing 581m answers.

target.mrk: El servicio de P&R de HealthTap ve 7.5M únicas al mes, con médicos pasando una hora por sesión brindando 581M de respuestas.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap distinguishes itself from other health education websites by having practicing physicians answer the consumers' questions.

trans-unit.source: Trust is the cornerstone of HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: Trust is the cornerstone of HealthTap.

target.mrk: La confianza es la piedra angular de HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a brilliant example of high-tech, high-touch medicine: social technology directly connecting practitioners and patients.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is a brilliant example of high-tech, high-touch medicine: social technology directly connecting practitioners and patients.

target.mrk: HealthTap es un brillante ejemplo de medicina holística de alta tecnología: tecnología social conectando directamente a facultativos y pacientes.

trans-unit.source: Very little, if any, of the information consumers read online comes from their own personal physicians – HealthTap aims to change that.

seg-source.mrk: Very little, if any, of the information consumers read online comes from their own personal physicians – HealthTap aims to change that.

target.mrk: Muy poca, si alguna, de la información que los consumidores leen en línea viene de tus propios médicos personales - HealthTap aspira a cambiar eso.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Takes Q&A with Your Physician Mobile.

target.mrk: HealthTap Hace Móviles las P&R con Tu Médico.

trans-unit.source: When we first heard about HealthTap, we were intrigued but thought for sure there must be a catch. But after meeting Gutman, I’m sold.

seg-source.mrk: When we first heard about HealthTap, we were intrigued but thought for sure there must be a catch. But after meeting Gutman, I’m sold.

target.mrk: La primera vez que escuchamos hablar de HealthTap, estábamos intrigados, pero pensamos que de seguro había una condición. Pero después de conocer a Gutman, estoy convencido.

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap] brilliantly shows the diversity of the medical community by allowing different physicians to answer the same question.

seg-source.mrk: [HealthTap] brilliantly shows the diversity of the medical community by allowing different physicians to answer the same question.

target.mrk: HealthTap muestra de forma brillante la diversidad de la comunidad médica al permitir que diferentes médicos contesten la misma pregunta.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is providing tens of millions of people with tailored health answers that will ultimately help save lives.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is providing tens of millions of people with tailored health answers that will ultimately help save lives.

target.mrk: HealthTap les brinda a decenas de millones de personas respuestas de salud a la medida, que terminarán salvando vidas.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is taking the first step to bring personalization to digital health by providing you and millions of others with access to more detailed health answers.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is taking the first step to bring personalization to digital health by providing you and millions of others with access to more detailed health answers.

target.mrk: HealthTap está tomando el primer paso para traer a la personalización a la salud digital al brindarte a ti y a millones de otros con acceso a respuestas de salud más detalladas.

trans-unit.source: What if you could have the best of both worlds – speaking to a real, live doctor and receiving quick answers without leaving home? HealthTap launched to provide people the ability to ask personal health questions to licensed physicians via the web and mobile devices.

seg-source.mrk: What if you could have the best of both worlds – speaking to a real, live doctor and receiving quick answers without leaving home? HealthTap launched to provide people the ability to ask personal health questions to licensed physicians via the web and mobile devices.

target.mrk: ¿Qué tal si pudieras tener lo mejor de los dos mundos – hablar con un doctor real en vivo, y recibir respuestas rápidas sin salir de casa? HealthTap se lanzó para brindar a la gente la habilidad de hacer preguntas de salud personales a médicos acreditados a través de la web y dispositivos móviles.

trans-unit.source: Like HealthTap, TipTaps are free and each tip is created for you by the world’s best doctors.

seg-source.mrk: Like HealthTap, TipTaps are free and each tip is created for you by the world’s best doctors.

target.mrk: Igual que HealthTap, los TipTaps son gratis, y cada tip es creado para ti por los mejores doctores del mundo.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has just released their newest venture for taking charge of our own health and well being: AppRX.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap has just released their newest venture for taking charge of our own health and well being: AppRX.

target.mrk: HealthTap acaba de lanzar su nuevo proyecto para tomar las riendas de nuestra propia salud y bienestar: AppRx.

trans-unit.source:
Bill Ericson has been working with startups his entire career as a founder, key advisor, counselor and investor. He believes that entrepreneurship drives the American economy, and that the best venture capitalists see their role as supporting and challenging entrepreneurs to their best performance. Bill’s current investment focus is the big data revolution that is driving the commercial, consumer media, and healthcare worlds. Bill serves on the Board of Northwestern University School of Law and received his B.S.F.S. from Georgetown University of Foreign Service and J.D. from Northwestern University School of Law.

MDV has over $1.4 billion under management and partners with entrepreneurs to architect and build successful companies. MDV invests in businesses that address significant challenges and opportunities, including personalizing medicine. MDV-funded companies that have gone public or been acquired include: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).

target.mrk:
Bill Ericson ha estado trabajando con start-ups toda su carrera como un fundador, asesor clave, consejero e inversionista. Él cree que el espíritu empresarial impulsa la economía americana, y que los mejores inversionistas de capital de riesgo ven su rol como el de apoyar y desafiar a emprendedores para dar lo mejor de sí. El enfoque actual de inversión de Bill es la revolución de big data que está impulsando los mundos comerciales de atención a la salud y medios para consumidores. Bill sirve en el Consejo de la Northwestern University School of Law y recibió su B.S.F.S de Georgetown University of Foreign Service y su J.D. de Northwestern University School of Law.

MDV tiene más de $1.4 billones bajo su administración y socios con emprendedores para planear y construir compañías exitosas. MDV invierte en negocios que abordan desafíos y oportunidades significativas, incluyendo la personalización de la medicina. Compañías fundadas por MDV que se han hecho públicas o han sido adquiridas incluyen: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; y Zip2 (AltaVista).

trans-unit.source:
Tim Chang is the Managing Director of the Mayfield Fund. Tim is a proven venture investor and experienced global executive. He was named on the 2011 Forbes Midas List of Top 100 Dealmakers and was featured by The Deal as one of five emerging VCs to watch. Tim invests in the mobile, gaming, digital media, and enterprise applications sectors. Prior to joining Mayfield Fund, Tim spent five years as a Partner at Norwest Venture Partners, and prior to Norwest, Tim worked for Gabriel Venture Partners, and as part of the founding team of CTR Ventures. Currently, Tim serves on the advisory boards of the Verizon 4G Venture Forum, Gamestop Corporation, Yoshimoto Kogyo, the Silicon Valley Telecom Council, MIT/Stanford VLAB, CasualConnect, and GamesBeat/MobileBeat. Tim holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, and an M.S. and B.S. from the University of Michigan.

Mayfield is a global venture capital firm with over $2.6 billion under management and a 45-year history of championing entrepreneurs. Mayfield invests primarily in early-stage consumer and enterprise-facing IT companies. Since its founding in 1969, the firm has invested in more than 500 companies, resulting in over 110 IPOs and more than 150 mergers or acquisitions. For more information, visit www.mayfield.com

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of Innovation Endeavors. Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology. From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy. Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman. Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer. Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG. Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novel, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems. Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.

seg-source.mrk: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of Innovation Endeavors. Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology. From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy. Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman. Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer. Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG. Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novel, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems. Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.

target.mrk: Eric Schmidt es el Presidente Ejecutivo de Google y el fundador de Innovation Endeavors. Desde que se unió a Google en el 2001, él ha ayudado a crecer desde un start-up de Silicon Valley a un líder global en tecnología. Desde el 2001 al 2011, Eric sirvió como el CEO de Google, supervisando su estrategia técnica y de negocios. Eric se unió a Google de Novell, donde sirvió como CEO de abril de 1997 a julio del 2001 y como presidente. Antes de Novel, tuvo varias posiciones en Sun Microsystems, incluyendo como CTO y CEO. Antes de unirse a Sun en 1983, Eric sirvió como un Miembro del personal de Investigación en el Laboratorio de Ciencias Computacionales de Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), y tuvo varias posiciones en Bell Laboratories y ZiLOG. Eric también sirvió como el Presidente de la New America Foundation, Google, Novel, e InSight Venture Partners, y como Director of Google, Apple, y Seibel Systems. Eric también es miembro del Consejo de Asesores en Ciencia y Tecnología del Presidente y del Consejo Asesor del Primer Ministro del Reino Unido. Eric tiene una Licenciatura en Ciencias y grados de M.S. en Ingenieria Eléctrica de Princeton University, y un Ph.D. en Ciencias Computacionales de la University of California-Berkeley.

trans-unit.source: We’re so excited to have you join us on a journey to a healthier, happier life! You now have instant access to millions of doctor answers, tips, news, app recommendations, and checklists from %{num_docs} top doctors. Ask a FREE health question 24/7 or connect with a doctor for a real-time virtual consult from the comfort of your smartphone, tablet or computer!

Ahora tienes acceso instantáneo a millones de respuestas, tips, noticias, recomendaciones de aplicaciones y listados de %{num_docs} de los mejores doctores. ¡Haz una pregunta de salud GRATIS, 24/7, o conéctate con un doctor para una consulta virtual en tiempo real desde la comodidad de tu teléfono inteligente, tableta o computadora!

trans-unit.source: Named a \"2015 Technology Pioneer\" by the World Economic Forum, HealthTap is rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings and has been praised by leading publications like WIRED, The New York Times, Forbes, Fortune, CNN, NBC, and Business Insider. Other recent accolades include:

Other recent accolades include:

target.mrk: Nombrado un \"Pionero Tecnológico del 2015\" por el World Economic Forum, HealthTap está desplazando rápidamente a ofertas de telemedicina tradicional, y ha sido aclamado por publicaciones líderes como WIRED, The New York Times, Forbes, Fortune, CNN, NBC y Business Insider. Otros galardones recientes incluyen:

trans-unit.source: My name is Kelly and I work at HealthTap, a company based in Silicon Valley that is revolutionizing the healthcare and travel-protection industry. By connecting patients and travelers to over 71,000 highly qualified doctors via any mobile device or computer, we partner with agencies like yours to give your customers the ultimate travel accessory: Peace of mind. The market is taking notice in a big way as we have recently been named a \"2015 Technology Pioneer\" by the World Economic Forum and are regularly featured in the business media, including The New York Times, Fortune, CNN, and NBC.

seg-source.mrk: My name is Kelly and I work at HealthTap, a company based in Silicon Valley that is revolutionizing the healthcare and travel-protection industry. By connecting patients and travelers to over 71,000 highly qualified doctors via any mobile device or computer, we partner with agencies like yours to give your customers the ultimate travel accessory: Peace of mind. The market is taking notice in a big way as we have recently been named a \"2015 Technology Pioneer\" by the World Economic Forum and are regularly featured in the business media, including The New York Times, Fortune, CNN, and NBC.

target.mrk: Mi nombre es Kelly y trabajo en HealthTap, una compañía basada en Silicon Valley que está revolucionando la atención a la salud y la industria de protección en viajes. Al conectar a pacientes y a viajeros con más de 71,000 doctores altamente calificados a través de cualquier dispositivo móvil o computadora, nos asociamos con agencias como la tuya para darle a tus clientes el mejor accesorio de viaje: Paz mental. El mercado se está percatando de nosotros, ya que recientemente nos nombraron un \"Pionero Tecnológico del 2015\" por el World Economic Forum, y frecuentemente aparecemos en medios de negocios, incluyendo a The New York Times, Fortune, CNN y NBC.

trans-unit.source:
Staying healthy is easier when it\'s a part of your everyday life. Below are some helpful tips for managing and improving health and well-being, as well as some recent answers to health questions on HealthTap.

You can visit my Virtual Practice on HealthTap at any time, before and between visits, to read more of my answers to health questions, and to discover more of my healthy living tips.

seg-source.mrk:
Staying healthy is easier when it\'s a part of your everyday life. Below are some helpful tips for managing and improving health and well-being, as well as some recent answers to health questions on HealthTap.

You can visit my Virtual Practice on HealthTap at any time, before and between visits, to read more of my answers to health questions, and to discover more of my healthy living tips.

target.mrk:
Mantenerte saludable es más fácil cuando es parte de tu vida diaria. Abajo están unos útiles tips para manejar y mejorar la salud y el bienestar, así como algunas respuestas recientes a preguntas de salud en HealthTap.

Puedes visitar mi Consultorio Virtual en HealthTap en cualquier momento, antes y entre visitas, para leer más acerca de mis respuestas a preguntas de salud, y para descubrir más de mis tips de cómo vivir sano.

trans-unit.source: Great news! You can now consult via live video or text chat with doctors who specialize in the goals and topics you care about most. We’ve handpicked %{expert_name_abb}, %{specialty}, just for you.

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn\'t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

seg-source.mrk: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn\'t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

target.mrk: Haz preguntas significativas: Las preguntas deben incluir suficiente detalle para ser significativas y contestables. Nombrar un tema (por ejemplo, "'¿dolor de cabeza?") sin preguntar algo específico, no le da suficiente información al doctor para contestar acertadamente. Puedes considerar mencionar el género, duración, grupo de edad, o área corporal afectada.

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors\' names.

seg-source.mrk: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors\' names.

target.mrk: Mantente privado: No incluyas tu nombre, nombres de otras personas o de doctores.

trans-unit.source: If you\'re a minor, ask an adult to help: We do not answer questions from minors under the age of 16, so parents should ask questions for teens and children.

seg-source.mrk: If you\'re a minor, ask an adult to help: We do not answer questions from minors under the age of 16, so parents should ask questions for teens and children.

target.mrk: Si eres menor de edad, pídele ayuda a un adulto:No contestamos preguntas de menores bajo la edad de 16 años, así que padres deben hacer preguntas por adolescentes y niños.

trans-unit.source: Have feedback? If you you have some direct feedback on where we can improve even more, please feel free to email us at %{email}. We always welcome your suggestions!

seg-source.mrk: Have feedback? If you you have some direct feedback on where we can improve even more, please feel free to email us at %{email}. We always welcome your suggestions!

trans-unit.source: Please know that you may re-activate your account at any time up to one year. After one year, your account information will likely be permanently deleted. Just write back to %{open_link}%{email}%{close_link} requesting re-activation. If you do come back, we’ll do our best to make sure you have the most delightful experience! :)

target.mrk: Por favor, ten en cuenta que puedes re-activar tu cuenta en cualquier momento hasta antes de un año. Después de un año, la información de tu cuenta seguramente será eliminada permanentemente. Sólo escríbenos a %{open_link}%{email}%{close_link} solicitando una reactivación. ¡Si regresas, haremos lo mejor posible para asegurarnos que tengas la más encantadora experiencia! :)

trans-unit.source:
I wanted to give you a code that will give you $%{amount} off on a subscription to HealthTap Prime, an exciting new digital health service that gives you unlimited Virtual Consults with top doctors 24/7 via video, voice, or text chat from any PC or mobile device.

Use my code %{promo_code} and get $%{amount} in credits toward your HealthTap Prime subscription!

With HealthTap Prime, you also get:

  • Total peace of mind, since you can consult a doctor anytime night or day on any issue
  • Prioritized answers to any health question you ask through HealthTap’s free service
  • Health checklists and tips customized just for you
  • Unlimited access to the world’s leading knowledgebase of doctor-created health information
  • Total confidentiality, with HIPAA-secure systems that safeguard your privacy

Subscribe today for ultimate peace of mind!

trans-unit.source: Doctor %{ai_serif} is an %{ai_serif}-powered personal \"physician\", trained by HealthTap’s network of more than 105,000 doctors, incorporates both context and clinical expertise of doctors who have helped triage hundreds of millions of patients worldwide to right levels of doctor-recommended care. Just like a sympathetic human physician, Dr. %{ai_serif} converses with the user to understand their current complaints or concerns and uses the user’s health profile to compute the probable causes of their symptoms.

seg-source.mrk: Doctor %{ai_serif} is an %{ai_serif}-powered personal \"physician\", trained by HealthTap’s network of more than 105,000 doctors, incorporates both context and clinical expertise of doctors who have helped triage hundreds of millions of patients worldwide to right levels of doctor-recommended care. Just like a sympathetic human physician, Dr. %{ai_serif} converses with the user to understand their current complaints or concerns and uses the user’s health profile to compute the probable causes of their symptoms.

target.mrk: Doctor %{ai_serif} is un \"médico\" personal impulsado por %{ai_serif}, entrenado por la red de más de 105,000 doctores de HealthTap, que incorpora contexto y destreza clínica de los doctores que han ayudado a hacer triage a cientos de millones de pacientes alrededor del mundo a los nievles adecuaados de atención recomendada por doctores. Justo como un comprensivo médico humano, Dr. %{ai_serif} charla con el usuario para entender sus quejas o preocupaciones actuales, y usa el perfil de salud del usuario para computar las causas probables de sus síntomas.
